text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters Kayleigh, Wuhan is a city not an ethnic group. Calling Covid19 Wuhan virus isn't a racial slur. "Kung Flu" IS a racial slur. I heard you went to Harvard. Who did you pay to get in? Frankly, your answers & reasoning don't scream Harvard educated. They scream panderer & muppet.
